name: DuckDuckGo Search
description: Performs web searches using DuckDuckGo. Returns titles, descriptions, and URLs of results
author: Shinkai

chromePath.description: Absolute path to Chrome/Chromium. Uses CHROME_PATH env var or default install paths if not set

message.description: Search query text. Supports DuckDuckGo search operators (e.g., site:, filetype:)
JSON array of results with title, description (with HTML tags), and URL for each match

puppeteer.description: Indicates if headless browser (Puppeteer) was used for search. True if Chrome path valid
